AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to be one of the many Batarian slavers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to be a disciplined soldier for the Hegemony.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to be a high ranking officer in the hegemony.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to be a colonist.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to be a doctor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Art major
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After NAME finished their art degree they aspired to become a rich, known artist. After years of working behind a kitchen counter on their homeplanet, they decided to look for inspiration and opportunities in a colonial life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Store partner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to work as a grocery store worker.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Basement dweller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to live in the basement of their parent's house, immersing themselves in virtual environment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to be a scientist, measuring temperatures on alien bodies and such.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cannibal
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent much of their adult life in a cannibalistic cult cooking and eating people of their kind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent most of their life as a slave.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sex worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used work as a sex toy for those with money.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Janitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used work as a janitor.. cleaning, maitaining and pranking cheeky interns.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Assembly worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used work as an assembly line worker. Twelve hour long shifts, four days a week made them into a mindles drone.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space explorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to explore the space with other good looking crew members.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME used to be one of the many Batarian space pirates.
